a.n: Kunlun combat professional league (kcpl), tongling, china, 06.07.2019

p.d: Kunlun Combat Professional League (KCPL) is China's first League Fighting Serial affliated to Kunlun Fight Fighting Championship. KCPL includes 16 top-tier kickboxing teams representing 16 Chinese cites on the bracket fighting for the ultimate supremacy. It adopts double round-robin for the pre-season and single elimination in the playoffs for a total of 125 fights throughout the year. Only the top 4 teams respectively from North and South Division will earn their spot in the playoffs to continue contending for the championship.
